page.title: 06Local Games (cont).
page.content: Non stop Cricket. You need a bat,a ball and two bases.Players are divided into two teams. Rules Decide which team is batting first. The other team is fielding .One of their players has to bowl.The bowler is trying to hit the base that the batsman is defending.The batsman has to run,even if he or she fails to hit the ball.If he gets to the other base and back that is one point but if he has just started to run and the bowler gets the ball,he is allowed to bowl the ball.If the bowler hits the base the person who is batting at the time is out.The next person in the batting team has to run and get the bat and try to defend the base.If the bowler hits the base with the ball the person who is about to bat is out.This goes on until all of the batting team is
